hostname.title: Webfilter VM IP or FQDN
hostname.description: Webfilter VM hostname or IP address

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management Network Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: Management network prefix length for Webfilter VM

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Network Gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: Management network gateway for Webfilter VM

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of Webfilter. It is a Linux network bridge. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration. Defaults to the global setting

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

target_server_type.title: Target Server Type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM will be instantiated

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, Webfilter requires 2 cores and sample values will be of the form [1, 2]

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the Webfilter VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the Webfilter VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_host_reference.title: vCenter Host Reference
vcenter_host_reference.description: Requires ovftool 4.3. Reference to the host on the vCenter cluster on which to deploy Nuage components

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the Webfilter VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

vcenter_vmfolder.title: vCenter VM Folder
vcenter_vmfolder.description: Optional path to a folder defined on vCenter where VM will be instantiated

preserve_vm.title: Preserve Webfilter VM
preserve_vm.description: Shuts down the vm during destroy process, instead of actually deleting them.

cert_name.title: Certificate Username
cert_name.description: Provide certificate username for Webfiler VM. Defaults to webfilter

web_http_proxy.title: Http proxy
web_http_proxy.description: Optional HTTP Proxy for webfilter VM

web_proxy_host.title: Http proxy host
web_proxy_host.description: HTTP Proxy host for webfilter proxy

web_proxy_port.title: Http proxy port
web_proxy_port.description: HTTP Proxy port for webfilter proxy

run_incompass_operation.title: Run incompass operation command
run_incompass_operation.description: Run incompass operation command. This is enabled by default and may take up to 20 minutes and requires internet connection.
